kyutai-standard.transcription: This is Unit 1 of Pimsleur's French 1. Listen to this French conversation. Est-ce que vous comprenez l'anglais ? Non, monsieur. Je ne comprends pas l'anglais. Je comprends un peu le français. Est-ce que vous êtes américain ? Oui, mademoiselle. In the next few minutes, you'll learn not only to understand this conversation, but to take part in it yourself. Imagine an American man sitting next to a French woman. He wants to begin a conversation, so he's...
